item.title: A Peek into Deep Reinforcement Learning - Part II
item.description: Second part of the Introduction to the world of Reinforcement Learning, where I cover some more advanced deep RL algorithms and ideas in the space.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello everybody, my name is Johann, I am a research scientist from Germany interested in the broad field of Machine Learning. My “research” (some people could argue that the stuff we are doing is no real research, sometimes I feel the same ;)) focuses mainly on the transfer of machine learning algorithms into business applications (prototypes, not the real stuff). Currently I am predominantly working in the field of Computer Vision but I look forward to diving deeper into Natural Language Processing and Reinforcement Learning in the future (robotics could also be a lot of fun and a ton to learn).

item.title: A Peek into Deep Reinforcement Learning - Part I
item.description: Introduction to the world of Reinforcement Learning, where I cover the basics and some algorithms.

item.title: Object Detection - From R-CNN to Mask R-CNN
Overview - Human Pose Estimation
item.description: Overview of Human Pose Estimation Algorithms, Datasets and Benchmarks.
